TaskDescription: Subjects were presented with two audiobooks simultaneously and instructed to attend to only one of them on a given trial. A female narrator read 'A Wrinkle in Time' and a male narrator read 'The Alchemyst'. Stimuli were presented diotically. Subjects were seated at a computer desk with a monitor in front of them which displayed a fixation dot. The fixation dot indicated the narrator that should be attended in addition to instructions prior to each trial. Subjects were encouraged to take breaks throughout the experiment.
